text: Allah ni Ajula jwaagumbile mawunde nsano nagawili, nombe nalyo litaka yalumope (mataka nsano nagawili). Malamusi gakuwa gali nkutuluka chilikati chakwe (cha mawunde ni mataka) kuti mmanyilile wanganyammwe yanti Allah pa chindu chilichose awele Jwakombola kusyene, ni yanti Allah amasile paachisyungwile chindu chilichose ni umanyilisi (waachimanya chenene)
